timeline.message:
Handle DeckConfig."timer" as boolean

Anki 2.1.24 converted this to an boolean, reverted in 2.1.25, but we
need to coerce it back to avoid a crash.

Fixes #6089

timeline.bodyText: Issue found: The utility class name 'DeckConfig' doesn't match '[A-Z][a-zA-Z0-9]+(Utils?|Helper|Constants)'
timeline.author: timrae
